Articles.Content:
Kerbin's had a few beauty passes over the years, and I'd like to have a map of what Kerbin looked like before v0.14.2, when the terrain engine was overhauled into more-or-less what we see today (aside from art differences.) So basically, a map of Kerbin circa the old 0.13.3 demo.

Remember? THIS kerbin:

Does a map like this exist? Not one that sorta looks like it, but one that is exactly that. Like, I want to be able to map the texture to a sphere and have it look like that.

And yes, I have a project based upon this upcoming. Nothing to get too excited about.

(And while we're at it, the Mun for this version as well.)

Edited February 18, 2015 by GregroxMun
This is the oldest map I can find, although I sure you've seen it before.

This is the oldest map I can find, although I sure you've seen it before.

http://i.imgur.com/G97KGC9.png

Yeah, that's 14.2-17.

It'll have to do...
You could download the old game and try and make one.

You could download the old game and try and make one.

I have the old game. But how would I make such a map? Would I literally have to do some real space-mapping techniques? That would be an interesting project if I had the patience for it.

Well I can think of three options

1) Find an old version of Mapsat or similar, if one is available.

2) Extract the map from the game files

3) Take a bunch of screenshots of the planet, and somehow warp and stitch them together into a single map.

I can verify that cantab's option 2 would have worked. I myself have extracted all the planet textures from 0.90 for personal use as EVE atmosphere textures (this can be used to make planets look overexposed from large distances).
nothing to do with this thread but i salute the old ksp parts that where removed or redesigned especially the mk1 command pod

nothing to do with this thread but i salute the old ksp parts that where removed or redesigned especially the mk1 command pod

Thankfully there's a mod for that if you ever want the old parts back: http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224715-legacy-parts-pack-v2-0
